body:
Tesla Motors, Inc. (TSLA) traded higher in the last at $252.95, gaining 0.44 points or 0.17%. From the data available, it can be said that the stock did not make an impact in the money flow department with the net figure coming to be $(-36.14) million. The composite uptick value of $216.23 million was eclipsed by the accrued downtick value of $252.38 million, thereby ensuring the up/down ratio of 0.86. For the week, the shares have posted returns of 3.36%.A block trade registered during the day has revealed $0 million in upticks and $22.99 million in downticks. The up/down ratio in this case turned out to be 0. The net money flow for the block trade was $(-22.99) million.Usually block trades are executed by Investment Banking firms or Mutual funds shifting positions or Day traders taking advantage of trading signals.

The Stock has a 52 week low of $141.05 and one year high of $269.34.Investing in Stocks require Stock Market Traders to look into all Trading Signals. Stock price is down 6.09% since it reached the one year high price and is down $ -16.39 since then. The company shares are up 79.33% from one year low and is up $111.9 since then.

Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) has received a short term rating of hold from experts at Zacks with a rank of 3. The stock has been rated an average of 3.35 by 17 Brokerage Firm. 2 Wall Street Firms have rated the stock as a strong buys. 1 stock experts have also suggested a buy rating. 8 Brokerage Firms have advised hold. 5 Analysts have rated it as strong sell. A sell rating was given by 1 analyst.

Tesla Motors Inc Last issued its quarterly earnings results on Oct 26, 2016. The company reported $0.71 EPS for the quarter, beating the analyst consensus estimate by $ 0.69. Analyst had a consensus of $0.02. The company had revenue of $2298.40 million for the quarter, compared to analysts expectations of $2316.88 million. The companys revenue was up 145.3% compared to the same quarter last year. During the same quarter in the previous year, the company posted $-0.58 EPS.

Several Stock Research Financial Advisors from Investment Banking firms have advised their client and investors on the stock.Tesla Motors Inc was Upgraded by Morgan Stanley on Jan 19, 2017 to Overweight, Price Target of the shares are set at $305.Tesla Motors Inc was Initiated by Guggenheim on Jan 4, 2017 to Buy, Price Target of the shares are set at $280.

Company has reported several Insider transactions to the SEC, on Jan 5, 2017, Kimbal Musk (director) sold 2,500 shares at 212.85 per share price.On Dec 19, 2016, Stephen T Jurvetson (director) sold 56 shares at 202.20 per share price.On Nov 25, 2016, Jeffrey B Straubel (Chief Technical Officer) sold 33,430 shares at 190.56 per share price.

Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) : On Friday heightened volatility was witnessed in Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) which led to swings in the share price. The stock opened for trading at $251.38 and hit $253 on the upside , eventually ending the session at $252.95, with a gain of 0.17% or 0.44 points. The heightened volatility saw the trading volume jump to 3,166,336 shares. The 52-week high of the share price is $269.34 and the company has a market cap of $40,747 million. The 52-week low of the share price is at $141.05 .
